_header: Alas in great sin all biget we were
Subjects: human life, transitory nature of; mortality

BLHar7322.Transcription: Allas in gret sinne alle beȝete we werestronge pines þoleden þe moderis þat vs berehere we liue bisiliche wit strong serwe & caredeȝe we ssulin sikerliche bot god wot wanne & were
